name: VNHumanBodyPoseObservation
desc: An observation that provides the body points the analysis recognized.

items.name: var availableJointNames: [VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName]
items.desc: The names of the available joints in the observation.

items.name: struct VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName
items.desc: The supported joint names for the body pose.

items.name: var availableJointsGroupNames: [VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName]
items.desc: The available joint group names in the observation.

items.name: struct VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName
items.desc: The supported joint group names for the body pose.

items.name: func recognizedPoint(VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName) -> VNRecognizedPoint
items.desc: Retrieves the recognized point for a joint name.

items.name: func recognizedPoints(VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName) -> [VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName : VNRecognizedPoint]
items.desc: Retrieves the recognized points associated with the joint group name.
